channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Your Home, Made Perfect
channel.desc: Two architects compete using virtual reality to win a commission to remodel a home in Teeside. Will the finished build live up to the hopes of the family who live there.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener And Friends
channel.desc: From colourful plant options around your pool, to alluring clipped formations. Tanya shares a DIY to make a wind chime for your garden, and XO takes on three herbs that every gardener should grow.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: On this season we have explored dream homes from across the country. Big or small, grand or quaint, by the water or in the country, we have learnt that a dream home is in the beholder's eye not the eyes of the beholder.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We are focus on female fertility as we look at the link between vitamin D and infertility. We share tips on for improve joint health and mobility. We look at some of the things we can do to prolong good eyesight as we age.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Carlo's Reno Rescue
channel.desc: Carlos, Jarrod and Jewel are renovating a room for staunch disabled sport advocate and warriors supporter Sandra Hickey.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The House JK Built
channel.desc: Sir John Kirwan and lady Fiorella's dream holiday home is taking shape in Waihi Beach.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Chateau DIY
channel.desc: Donna and Paul are waving the flag for Scotland as they create a highlander themed suite. Chris and Jolyon are in a tight squeeze finishing a very narrow bathroom.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: Sonali Shah is in the Essex countryside helping a church minister and his wife to make their very first house purchase.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey
channel.desc: Simon shows his trick to the crispiest refried bean empanadas, and gives the low down on plant-based feta which he uses to top off a vibrant and summery salad.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Find Me A Beach House
channel.desc: Dave and Pressia sold their family home of over 10 years. They want a beach home in the Sydney seaside town, Manly. They need some cash left-over to purchase a home in South of France.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Everyday
channel.desc: Scotland-inspired Cullen skink fishcakes (smoked haddock) and a fiery take on peri-peri chicken.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.desc: Rachael and Tim can't agree on whether to stay in their 1930s semi or up sticks.

channel.title: Ten Minute Kitchen
channel.desc: Asian inspired, starting with Scott's recipe made with leftover chicken and vegetables from a family roast. Using leftovers to create amazing midweek meals is always useful and here is an easy Chicken Noodle Soup recipe.
